original: @195a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @195a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i m'a nma h'a bo dhi bha tt'a ra ka sya sto tram /
analyzed: shr'i m'a nma h'a bo dhi bha tt'a ra ka sya sto tram /
translated: 콐r캶-m캐n-mah캐-bodhisattva-bh캐攷믈ta-stotra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dpal ldan rje btsun byang chub chen po'i bstod pa /
analyzed: dpal ldan rje btsun byang chub chen po'i bstod pa /
translated: The Praise of the Glorious and Venerable Great Bodhisattva

original: sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Buddha!

original: pad dkar spyan mnga' rdzogs sangs rgyas //
analyzed: pad dkar spyan mnga' rdzogs sangs rgyas //
translated: You have eyes like a white lotus, you are a perfect Buddha,

original: thugs rje'i go 'phang thams cad mkhyen //
analyzed: thugs rje'i go 'phang thams cad mkhyen //
translated: You have attained the state of compassion, you are omniscient,

original: sh'akya seng ge kun du bzang //
analyzed: sh'akya seng ge kun du bzang //
translated: You are the lion of the 콐캐kyas, you are Samantabhadra,

original: ston pa la ni bdag phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: ston pa la ni bdag phyag 'tshal //
translated: I pay homage to the Teacher.

original: dpal stug dpal ldan gtso bo ste //游댷zhi mdzad tshul khrims phung po can //
analyzed: dpal stug dpal ldan gtso bo ste // zhi mdzad tshul khrims phung po can //
translated: You are the glorious one, the glorious chief,游댷You are the one who pacifies, you are the one who possesses the aggregate of discipline,

original: zhi ba dpal ldan dpal mdzad pa //
analyzed: zhi ba dpal ldan dpal mdzad pa //
translated: You are the peaceful one, you are the glorious one, you are the one who creates glory,

original: zhi ba'i sku mngar bdag phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: zhi ba'i sku mngar bdag phyag 'tshal //
translated: I pay homage to you, the one who possesses a peaceful body.

original: grub pa bdag med gsung mdzad pa //
analyzed: grub pa bdag med gsung mdzad pa //
translated: You are the one who proclaims the selflessness of phenomena,

original: kha na ma tho'i gnas ma mchis//
analyzed: kha na ma tho'i gnas ma mchis//
translated: You are the one who does not have any basis for wrongdoing,游댷You are the one who knows the system, you are the one who is stainless,

original: lugs mkhyen dri ma mi mnga'i bdag / rnyog mi mnga' la bdag phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: lugs mkhyen dri ma mi mnga'i bdag / rnyog mi mnga' la bdag phyag 'tshal //
translated: I pay homage to you, the one who is free from turbidity.

original: 'gran zla nga rgyal mi mnga' zhing //
analyzed: 'gran zla nga rgyal mi mnga' zhing //
translated: You are the one who does not have any rival or pride,

original: rnam rtog mi mnga' de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: rnam rtog mi mnga' de bzhin gshegs //
translated: You are the one who does not have any conceptualization, you are the Tath캐gata,

original: nyon mongs kun gyis mi bsgul pa //
analyzed: nyon mongs kun gyis mi bsgul pa //
translated: You are unshaken by any affliction.

original: spros mi mnga' la bdag phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: spros mi mnga' la bdag phyag 'tshal //
translated: I pay homage to you, the one without conceptual elaboration.

original: sna tshogs dbang phyug rnam grol mkhyen //
analyzed: sna tshogs dbang phyug rnam grol mkhyen //
translated: You are the lord of various things, the knower of liberation,

original: sna tshogs gzugs can rnam par 'dren //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs can rnam par 'dren //
translated: The guide with various forms,

original: sna tshogs mtshan rnams yang dag rdzogs //
analyzed: sna tshogs mtshan rnams yang dag rdzogs //
translated: The one with perfect various marks.

original: 'dod chags bral la bdag phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: 'dod chags bral la bdag phyag 'tshal //
translated: I pay homage to you, the one free from desire.游댷You are the tamer of the difficult to tame, the supreme being,

original: gdul dka' 'dul mdzad sems can mchog / dag pa thub pa zas gtsang sras //
analyzed: gdul dka' 'dul mdzad sems can mchog / dag pa thub pa zas gtsang sras //
translated: The pure sage, the son of 콐uddhodana,

original: bde gshegs legs rtogs zhi mdzad pa //
analyzed: bde gshegs legs rtogs zhi mdzad pa //
translated: The one who has attained bliss, the one who brings peace,

original: dge bar grags la bdag phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: dge bar grags la bdag phyag 'tshal //
translated: The one renowned as virtuous. I pay homage to you.游댷You are free from the enemy of desire, the one liberated from defilement,

original: rnyog pa las grol 'dod pa'i dgra / rnyog pa mi mnga' pad+ma 'chang //
analyzed: rnyog pa las grol 'dod pa'i dgra / rnyog pa mi mnga' pad+ma 'chang //
translated: The lotus holder without defilement,

original: mdzes pa'i sku mnga' thugs brtse'i snod //
analyzed: mdzes pa'i sku mnga' thugs brtse'i snod //
translated: The one with a beautiful body, the vessel of compassion,

original: pad+ma'i 'od mngar bdag phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: pad+ma'i 'od mngar bdag phyag 'tshal //
translated: The one with the light of lotuses. I pay homage to you.

original: blo gros chen po brtson 'grus che //
analyzed: blo gros chen po brtson 'grus che //
translated: You have great intelligence, great diligence,

original: stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po //
analyzed: stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po //
translated: Great strength, and great conquest,

original: mchod pa chen po bstan pa che //
analyzed: mchod pa chen po bstan pa che //
translated: Great offerings, and great teachings.

original: sgra gcan chen por bdag phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: sgra gcan chen por bdag phyag 'tshal //
translated: I pay homage to you, the great R캐hu.

original: rig dang zhabs ni phun sum tshogs //
analyzed: rig dang zhabs ni phun sum tshogs //
translated: And whose knowledge and conduct are perfect.

original: sna tshogs dbang po dri med 'od //
analyzed: sna tshogs dbang po dri med 'od //
translated: You are the stainless light of the various senses,

original: rnam dul cha byad yangs pa can //
analyzed: rnam dul cha byad yangs pa can //
translated: Well-disciplined, with a vast appearance,

original: skyon dang bral la bdag phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: skyon dang bral la bdag phyag 'tshal //
translated: Free from faults, to you I pay homage.

original: 'phags pa gtsang mdzad kun la sman //
analyzed: 'phags pa gtsang mdzad kun la sman //
translated: Noble one, you are pure, a medicine for all,

original: gzhan gyis mi thub nyams mi mnga' //
analyzed: gzhan gyis mi thub nyams mi mnga' //
translated: Unconquerable by others, without decline,

original: bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i mgon //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i mgon //
translated: The protector who benefits self and others,

original: dpag med 'od mngar bdag phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: dpag med 'od mngar bdag phyag 'tshal //
translated: To you, immeasurable light, I pay homage.

original: lha yi lha ste lha chen po //
analyzed: lha yi lha ste lha chen po //
translated: God of gods, great god,

original: lha yis phyag byas zad mi mnga' //
analyzed: lha yis phyag byas zad mi mnga' //
translated: Godly one, worshipped by the gods, inexhaustible,

original: tshad mar gyur pa lha yi dbang //
analyzed: tshad mar gyur pa lha yi dbang //
translated: The measure, the lord of gods,

original: lha rdzas gzugs mngar bdag phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: lha rdzas gzugs mngar bdag phyag 'tshal //
translated: To you, with your divine form, I pay homage.

original: don dam mchog tu gsal mdzad pa //
analyzed: don dam mchog tu gsal mdzad pa //
translated: You illuminate the supreme ultimate truth,

original: @195b mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa ste //
analyzed: @195b mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa ste //
translated: The supreme lord, the holy one,

original: mchog tu gzhan la phan mdzad pa //
analyzed: mchog tu gzhan la phan mdzad pa //
translated: Supremely benefiting others,

original: bcom ldan de la bdag phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: bcom ldan de la bdag phyag 'tshal //
translated: To the Blessed One, I pay homage.

original: bdud bzhi'i dgra las rnam par rgyal //
analyzed: bdud bzhi'i dgra las rnam par rgyal //
translated: Victorious over the four m캐ra enemies,

original: zhi ba zhi mdzad de nyid mkhyen //
analyzed: zhi ba zhi mdzad de nyid mkhyen //
translated: Peaceful, the knower of reality,

original: de nyid snying bo rtag tu spyod //
analyzed: de nyid snying bo rtag tu spyod //
translated: Always practicing the essence itself,

original: ded dpon la ni bdag phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: ded dpon la ni bdag phyag 'tshal //
translated: I pay homage to the captain.

original: dbang po thul ba nyon mongs thul //
analyzed: dbang po thul ba nyon mongs thul //
translated: The one who has tamed the senses, the one who has tamed the afflictions,游댷The lord of the victors, the supreme being,

original: rgyal ba'i dbang po skyes bu mchog / tshangs pa dam pa mchog gyur pa //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i dbang po skyes bu mchog / tshangs pa dam pa mchog gyur pa //
translated: The holy and supreme Brahma,

original: bsod nams zhing la bdag phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: bsod nams zhing la bdag phyag 'tshal //
translated: I pay homage to the field of merit.

original: 'dod chags bral ba bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: 'dod chags bral ba bcom ldan 'das //
translated: The one free from attachment, the Bhagavan,

original: khyod kyi sku nyid la bstod pas //
analyzed: khyod kyi sku nyid la bstod pas //
translated: By praising your very body,

original: dmyal ba'i me nang gnas pa rnams //
analyzed: dmyal ba'i me nang gnas pa rnams //
translated: May those dwelling in the fires of hell

original: bsil ba'i gnas ni thob gyur cig /
analyzed: bsil ba'i gnas ni thob gyur cig /
translated: Attain the state of coolness.

original: dpal ldan rje btsun byang chub chen po'i bstod pa mchog sred kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: dpal ldan rje btsun byang chub chen po'i bstod pa mchog sred kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa'o //
translated: This praise of the glorious venerable great bodhisattva was composed by Vararuci.

original: 'di yang gangs can skad nyid du //游댷rje btsun sprul pa'i sku mchog gi //游댷bka' bzhin zha lu lo ts'a ba //
analyzed: 'di yang gangs can skad nyid du // rje btsun sprul pa'i sku mchog gi // bka' bzhin zha lu lo ts'a ba //
translated: This was also translated into the language of the snowy land游댷By the Zha-lu lotsawa游댷The monk Ch칬kyong Zangpo,

original: dge slong chos skyong bzang pos bsgyur//
analyzed: dge slong chos skyong bzang pos bsgyur//
translated: In accordance with the words of the supreme emanation body, the venerable one.
